    • Method Detail

      • semiLegalMoves

        public java.util.List<Move> semiLegalMoves()
        Generates and returns list of semi legal moves. Semi legal moves are all moves that a piece can make ignoring kings state (if king under capture) after the move
        Specified by:
        semiLegalMoves in class Piece
        Returns:
        list of semi legal moves

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        kingsPosition - kings position
        Returns:

      • move

        public void move(Position destination)
        Changes position of the piece on the board (in bounds: row: 0-7 and column: 0-7)
        Overrides:
        move in class Piece
        Parameters:

      • update

        public void update()
        Generates and saves all legal moves it can make. Legal moves are all possible moves that don't put king under capture.
        Overrides:
        update in class Piece

      • giveEnPassantRights

        public void giveEnPassantRights(Position position)
        Gives en passant rights to capture pawn on specified position. Rights are only saved by piece of type pawn and will be withdrawn after next update on piece.
        Overrides:
        giveEnPassantRights in class Piece
        Parameters:
        position - of the pawn to be captured by en passant
